content:
Configurations

  • 32KB L1 data cache, 32B lines, direct-map

  • 0.5MB L2 cache, 64B line, direct-map

  • 8-line write buffer

  • Latencies:

    • 1-cycle L1, 8-cycle L2, 60-cycle memory
    • 1-cycle prefetch, Write Buffer, Victim Cache

  • All 3 mechanisms at once
